text: Doriana Pigliapoco (born 25 November 1957) is an Italian fencer. She competed in the women's team foil event at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Italy Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics
title: Doriana Pigliapoco
